channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Album and Image Gallery with Lightbox – Flagallery Photo Portfolio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Album and Image Gallery with Lightbox – Flagallery Photo Portfolio

item.title: CVE-2021-24903|2024-08-03T19:49:13.972Z -- unknown -- album%20and%20image%20gallery%20with%20lightbox%20%E2%80%93%20flagallery%20photo%20portfolio
item.description: The GRAND FlaGallery WordPress plugin through 6.1.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its gallery settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
